official_title: Examining the Feasibility and Acceptability of an App-based Mindfulness Intervention for Sexual Minority Women With a History of Early Life Adversities (ELA): A Single Arm Trial
inclusion_criteria:
(a) 30-55 years of age; (b) BMI â‰¥ 25; (c) fluent in English; (d) have a smartphone; (e) reside in the U.S.; (f) experience food (salty or sweet) cravings and endorsed overeating of these foods (i.e. responded 'yes' to 'do you find yourself eating more than you'd like of a particular food or category of foods?') at least 4 times per week; (g) self-identify as a sexual minority woman (e.g., lesbian, bisexual, queer, or other sexual minority women); and (h) experienced early life adversity, screened via an adapted measure of childhood abuse.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 30 Years
Must have maximum age of 55 Years
exclusion_criteria: (a) current eating disorder; (b) current strict diet (e.g. paleo, keto, vegan, calorie restriction); (c) current insulin use; (d) pregnant or trying to become pregnant; (e) previous use of the "Eat Right Now" application; and (f) history of serious mental illness, such as bipolar or psychotic disorders or self-injurious behaviors.
